title: Coalition Recruiter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, make a player a flagbearer. This resolves and is publicly announced at the beginning of the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While declaring targets for abilities or game actions, if a flagbearer is a legal target, players other than you must target at least one flagbearer.

desc:
Post 2373
*Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.*
